title: WATERMELONS  This is the first year Ive had enough space to grow large.

tasks.task: Planting and caring for watermelon plants
subtasks: Raise planting position above ground level
Ensure proper drainage for clay soil by elevating
Plant multiple seeds in one mound
Select the strongest seedlings after initial germination
Limit each mound to three to four mature plants
Provide ample space for vine growth, about 20 feet per vine
Monitor plant spacing for optimal vine expansion
